001package com.exoreaction.xorcery.neo4j;
002
003import com.codahale.metrics.Gauge;
004import com.codahale.metrics.MetricRegistry;
005import com.exoreaction.xorcery.neo4j.client.GraphDatabase;
006import jakarta.inject.Inject;
007import jakarta.inject.Provider;
008import org.glassfish.hk2.runlevel.RunLevel;
009import org.jvnet.hk2.annotations.Service;
010import org.neo4j.graphdb.GraphDatabaseService;
011import org.neo4j.kernel.impl.factory.GraphDatabaseFacade;
012import org.neo4j.kernel.impl.transaction.stats.TransactionCounters;
013
014@Service(name = "neo4j.metrics")
015@RunLevel(4)
016public class Neo4jMetricsService {
017
018    @Inject
019    public Neo4jMetricsService(GraphDatabase graphDatabase, Provider<MetricRegistry> metricRegistryProvider) {
020        MetricRegistry metricRegistry = metricRegistryProvider.get();
021        if (metricRegistry != null)
022        {
023            TransactionCounters txCounters = ((GraphDatabaseFacade) graphDatabase.getGraphDatabaseService()).getDependencyResolver().resolveDependency(TransactionCounters.class);
024            metricRegistry.gauge("activeTransactions", (MetricRegistry.MetricSupplier<Gauge<Long>>) () -> txCounters::getNumberOfActiveTransactions);
025            metricRegistry.gauge("committedTransactions", (MetricRegistry.MetricSupplier<Gauge<Long>>) () -> txCounters::getNumberOfCommittedTransactions);
026            metricRegistry.gauge("rolledBackTransactions", (MetricRegistry.MetricSupplier<Gauge<Long>>) () -> txCounters::getNumberOfRolledBackTransactions);
027            metricRegistry.gauge("peakConcurrentTransactions", (MetricRegistry.MetricSupplier<Gauge<Long>>) () -> txCounters::getPeakConcurrentNumberOfTransactions);
028        }
029    }
030}
